turns.user_message: I need to set up medication reminders. Can you help me with that?
turns.assistant_message: Absolutely. I can help you find a suitable app. What features are most important to you?

turns.user_message: I prioritize a simple interface and customizable reminders.
turns.assistant_message: Understood. Visual alerts are also key for you, correct?

turns.user_message: Yes, visual alerts are a priority for me.
turns.assistant_message: Great. And you need support for multiple medications?

turns.user_message: Yes, I definitely need the app to support multiple medications.

turns.user_message: Can you provide more information about Medisafe and MyTherapy?

turns.user_message: Based on this, I think I'll go with Medisafe. What's the next step to set it up?

user_profile.name: Emily Johnson
user_profile.description: Emily is a 22-year-old college student majoring in Business Administration. With her analytical personality and professional language style, she finds herself navigating the complexities of medication management for her busy lifestyle. Despite her novice tech experience, she recognizes the importance of setting medication reminders to maintain her health amidst her very urgent time constraints.

instructions.dialogue: Express only basic needs, let the assistant ask questions.

instructions.hidden_state: Express moderate emotions and intentions in your inner thoughts.

Quickly adjusting reminders due to time constraints
Visual reminders that can be easily seen in a crowded environment
